SwarmHistory.h

00001 /* ======================================================================================
00002 SWARMHISTORY - is a record of all swarming events (e.g. instantaneously forming groups) 
00003 in the tracked video. 
00004 
00005 SWARMEVENT - Is described by: 
00006     - type of event (GROUPING, LEADER FOLLOWING, LINING UP, CO-DWELLING, etc)
00007     - list of unique event participant IDs (bodies)
00008     - start frame and stop frame
00009 ======================================================================================== */
